modName: MORE Additional Player Voices for Skyrim
summary: Tired of being mute ? http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21215 allows your character to speak at several occasions. Currently, it is not possible to have multiple PC voices installed. So you have to choose and install ONLY ONE. See the different available voices below.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all ! Job finally got me ;)

This mod is no longer in progress.

-If you want more voices, you can do it yourself by replacing the .wav files with other .wav
-if you want less voices (for example, only the cast sounds), delete the files containing the sounds you don\'t want to hear
-if you want to adjust when the sounds are played, then you have to modify the scripts (or ask someone who know how to script to do it for you).

[color=red][size=5]contents[/size]
[list][*]Description
[*]What\'s new ?
[*]What\'s next ?
[*]Installation instructions
[*]Current available voices
[*]Example (what is going to say your PC and when ?)
[*]Credits[/list][/color]

[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/description_zps63fd3e2a.png[/IMG][/center]

Tired of being mute ?  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url] allows your character to speak at several occasions. Currently, it is not possible to have multiple PC voices installed. [u]So you have to choose and install ONLY ONE[/u]. See the different available voices below.

[color=red]You liked it ? Endorse it ![/color]

The original mod can be found here : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4911907]nanahane[/url]
It contains a unique japanese female voice.

[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/whatsnew_zpsb29debe2.png[/IMG][/center]
[list]
[*]Female Evil Lady voice (French, English, German, Italian)
[*]I forgot to add cast sounds to Female Commoner and the Italian translation of the male voice: fixed that.
[*]Female Commoner voice (French, English, German, Italian)
[*]Male Even Toned voice, in four flavours, translated in Italian
[*]Video showing some of the English voices in game
[*]Male Even Toned voice, in four flavours : Commoner, Good Warrior, Mad Warrior and Evil Mage: German version
[*]Male Even Toned voice, in four flavours : Commoner, Good Warrior, Mad Warrior and Evil Mage. French and English only for now.
[/list]
[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/whatsnext_zpseee53ead.png[/IMG][/center]
(no plans for the future. Sorry folks. Feel free to modify it the way you want)
[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/installation_zpsde3e63a5.png[/IMG][/center]

1.Extract the archive.
=> Option 1 : Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21215]Additional Player Voices for Skyrim[/url] and overwrite with a voice from this page. 
=> Option 2 : Download the esp and the scripts (main file) and a voice (optional file), and install them both. Note that the Option 1 guarantees you\'ll have the last update of nanahane\'s mod. [u]Don\'t forget you can only install one voice at a time !![/u]
2.Copy the data folder to your Skyrim Data folder.

The mod gives you a new power (in your magic tab) that allow you to activate/deactivate your voice.

[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/currentvoices_zpsf086bddf.png[/IMG][/center]
[list]
[color=red][size=5]Female human voice[/size][/color]

[color=green][size=4]Female Young Eager Voice[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           Young women voice.
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/polish_zpscd07b6eb.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]This is the typical female warrior. Not very aggressive, not too confident, but not a coward either.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu6lmm_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/femaleyoungeager_zpsb2abfbf2.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Female Commoner Voice[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           female even toned voice (= red guard voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The female commoner wasn\'t born to be an adventurer. She fears enemies, screams for help when they show up, and complains about the frost.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu8jql_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/femalecommoner_zpse247fc9a.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Female Evil Lady Voice[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           female even toned voice (= red guard voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The evil lady despises her enemies and kills them with style. She is a little bit haughty and is very self confident.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [i]Coming soon[/i]

[color=red][size=5]Male human voice[/size][/color]

[color=green][size=3]Male Guard Voice[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           City guards voice.
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/polish_zpscd07b6eb.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/portuguese_zps5cda9d40.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/spanish_zps27590e09.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]This is the typical male warrior. Not very aggressive, not too confident, but not a coward either.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu6kb0_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/guard_zpsaa44aac9.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Male Good Warrior[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           male even toned voice (= red guards voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The good warrior don\'t like to kill, but doesn\'t fear the enemy. He knows when tactic requires hiding. He like is life to be adventurous and is rather optimistic.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu7gtt_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/goodwarrior_zps88154338.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Male Mad Warrior[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           male even toned voice (= red guards voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The mad warrior is a beast. He enjoy killing his enemies without hiding. He never asks for mercy.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu7hv7_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/madwarrior_zps10c129b2.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Male Commoner[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           male even toned voice (= red guards voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The commoner wasn\'t born to be an adventurer. He fears enemies, screams for help when they show up, and is thankful to the gods for being still alive ![/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu6mz2_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/commoner_zpse1af20d8.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=green][size=3]Male Evil Mage[/size][/color]
[*][u]Based on:[/u]
           male even toned voice (= red guards voice).
[*][u]Supported languages:[/u]
           [IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/french_zps74533090.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/english_zpsaefbf1d0.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/german_zps799245e6.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/italian_zpsc0959886.png[/IMG]
[*][u]Small description:[/u]
           [i]The evil mage is a learned scholar. He hunts and kills his enemies without mercy, but always with dignity.[/i]
[*][u]Preview:[/u]
           [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xu6nnt_more-additional-player-voices-for-skyrim_videogames][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/evilmage_zps31d6c393.png[/IMG][/url]
[/list]
[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/example_zpsa41db1f5.png[/IMG][/center]

[color=green][b]- Discover new place[/b][/color]
[i]=> Ysmir\'s beard !![/i]
[i]=> I never would\'ve believed it if I had\'nt seen it with my own eyes...[/i]
[i]=> By the gods ! I don\'t even know what to say ! [/i]

[color=green][b]- 25% or less health of the player[/b][/color]
[i]=> What ? No ![/i]
[i]=> Help me ! Help me ![/i]
[i]=> By the gods ! No ![/i]

[color=green][b]- 50% or less health of the player[/b][/color]
[i]=> AAAaaaaah ![/i]
[i]=> No ! Not like this ![/i]
[i]=> Please ! Mercy !![/i]

[color=green][b]- Get the Dragon Soul[/b][/color]
[i]=> Ysmir\'s beard !![/i]
[i]=> Gods help us ![/i]
[i]=> Look out ! Don\'t get too close ![/i]

[color=green][b]- Start combat (= enemies seen)[/b][/color]
[i]=> Skyrim has no use for your kind.[/i]
[i]=> Then let me speed your passage to Sovnguard ![/i]
[i]=> Then pay with your blood ![/i]
[i]=> You really thought you could get away with it ?[/i]
[i]=> I\'ll teach you to talk to me that way ![/i]

[color=green][b]- Kill enemy (player or companion kills a enemy)[/b][/color]
[i]=> So be it.[/i]
[i]=> Well that was an unpleasant bit of business ![/i]
[i]=> Guess they deserved it ![/i]
[i]=> What\'s done is done ![/i]
[i]=> Is it really dead ?[/i]

[color=green][b]- Increase skill[/b][/color]
[i]=> I can\'t believe that worked ![/i]
[i]=> Something to tell the grandkids, they ?[/i]
[i]=> I can\'t believe I\'m still alive ![/i]

[color=green][b]- Cast a spell(hostile)[/b][/color]
[i]=> (three magic incantations)[/i]

[color=green][b]- Cast a spell(not hostile)[/b][/color]
[i]=> (three magic incantations)[/i]

[color=green][b]- Shoot an arrow[/b][/color]
[i]=> You\'re pushing your luck ![/i]
[i]=> You can\'t hide from me ![/i]
[i]=> You can\'t win this ![/i]

[color=green][b]- Sneak[/b][/color]
[i]=> Yep... That will work.[/i]
[i]=> Je vais débarasser l\'empire de ces parasitTime to clean the empire of its filth ![/i]
[i]=> Take cover ![/i]

[color=green][b]- Weapons(or Spell) out[/b][/color]
[i]=> What was that ?[/i]
[i]=> Hu ?[/i]
[i]=> Ah ! Found you ![/i]

[center][IMG]http://i1305.photobucket.com/albums/s557/gawangawan/credits_zps46bd1c9c.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][color=red]Contributors[/color][/center]

A big thank to all of them !!
[list][*]DanteVercetti (Male Brazilian voice, voiced by himself)
[*]nanahane (original mod & female japanese voice)
[*]vito740 (Female and Male Polish voice). See also [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24129]his mod[/url] modifying music and sounds.[/list]

author: gawan
